featured.subject: Kirsty Payne
featured.title: The power of laughter & making time for my family
featured.description: Kristy Payne shares how she prioritises her health and time with her family thanks to MYOB’s flexible working plan

featured.subject: Rob Sturrock
featured.title: I’m a Dad that knows the struggle is real
featured.description: Rob Sturrock took time away from his public policy role and he couldn’t be happier he did.

stories.subject: Sueanne O’Leary
stories.title: Sueanne O’Leary on staying in the loop on parental leave
stories.description: Being invested in every facet of a brand makes it difficult to step away. Sueanne O’Leary talks about staying in the loop after the birth of baby Manu.

stories.subject: Isabel Basting
stories.title: A mother’s heartache of her stillborn baby girl
stories.description: Isabel shares the heartbreaking story of her firstborn daughter Matilda’s stillbirth, her grief, the challenges returning to work, and how to support other parents who have lost a child.

stories.subject: Emma Beckingham
stories.title: Why empathy and flexibility are the key to helping new parents
stories.description: How to achieve less stress and more wellbeing when caring for a child with additional needs? Emma Beckngham shares her story.
